snippet: For employers, there are benefits and costs to replacing full-time employees with part-time ones, and the Affordable Care Act will provide an interesting case study in how this plays out.
abstract: For employers, there are benefits and costs to replacing full-time employees with part-time ones, and the Affordable Care Act will provide an interesting case study in how this plays out.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
